data.name: RescueLander.almost
data.value: Almost there! Proceed with caution while descending towards the platform. Try to reduce your vertical velocity with throttle as you get close to land. An impact could be your end.

data.name: RescueLander.congratscoins
data.value: Congratulations! Here is your reward, some Coins for your next purchase!

data.name: RescueLander.congratscolor
data.value: Congratulations! Here is your reward, some new Colors for your Ship!

data.name: RescueLander.congratspower
data.value: Congratulations! Here is your reward, some PowerUps for your Ship!

data.name: RescueLander.descbow
data.value: Take a ride on the 'Dark Side'

data.name: RescueLander.desccoin
data.value: Using your telekinesis is fine but... If you really want some more coins use our patented "Coin Magnet".

data.name: RescueLander.desccritic
data.value: About to reach the landing platform but lacking a bit of fuel? Get some extra fuel to finish

data.name: RescueLander.descenergy
data.value: This awesome energy shield will protect you against collisions, reducing the damage taken by the ship

data.name: RescueLander.descmighty
data.value: A sturdier case for a direct approach.

data.name: RescueLander.descoriginal
data.value: The trusted standard ship in the Rescuers fleet.

data.name: RescueLander.desctaboo
data.value: For REAL comfort and high end features.

data.name: RescueLander.first
data.value: First of all with the Conrtrol Interface.' 'In this panel you can see 2 bars, the one above is the ship integrity. The bar below is the fuel left in your deposit.

data.name: RescueLander.forthe
data.value: For the last lesson you have to man the ship to the new area at the right using all the controls you've learned, rotate the ship clockwise and throttle to advance. Try it now...

data.name: RescueLander.hello
data.value: Hello there Rookie!' 'Welcome to the Rescuers' initiation course, here you'll learn all you need to know about piloting your own Rescue Lander.

data.name: RescueLander.lastbut
data.value: Last but equally important.' 'This is the Landing Platform, where you will start and finish every mission. And on top of it is the ship you're piloting.

data.name: RescueLander.ontheright
data.value: On the right panel you have the minimap to help you orient in the unexplored planets. And the Pause button at the right, where you can acces some extra options.

data.name: RescueLander.perfect
data.value: Perfect! Now, to change the direction you're heading, turn with the thrusters. Tap and hold in the right or left half of the screen to rotate clockwise or counter clockwise respectively.

data.name: RescueLander.right
data.value: Right below this panel is the rescued Astronauts indicator.' 'This icons will turn on when you rescue an Astronaut from the surface, be sure to have all of them before you come back!

data.name: RescueLander.thefinal
data.value: The final Mission on becoming a Rescuer! Congratulations, not everyone makes it this far! This is a simulation of a real mission out there. So.. Are you ready?

data.name: RescueLander.welcometo
data.value: Welcome to Mission 2! You're one step closer to become a professional Rescuer! Get ready on this mission, as you're gonna afront a real Landing by your own!

data.name: RescueLander.wouldad
data.value: Would you like to earn some Coins by watching an Ad?

data.name: RescueLander.wouldinvert
data.value: Would you like to invert the controls for the ship's rotation?

data.name: RescueLander.youcan
data.value: (You can change this setting later from the options menu)

data.name: RescueLander.yourfirst
data.value: Your first lesson is taking off. To lift the ship you have to use the throttle.Tap and hold in both sides of the screen at the same time, you will accelerate upwards until you release.

data.name: RescueLander.yourobjective
data.value: Your objective is to reach the area indicated above and keep the ship inside for a short time. Try to stabilize the ship with short bursts of throtte. Try it now...

data.name: RescueLander.yourobjective2
data.value: Your objective is to reach the landing platfrom at the opposite side of the box pile, and then land on it. Be careful and procced gradually as you could damage the ship...

data.name: RescueLander.yourobjective3
data.value: Your objective is to reach the lost astronaut at the right, land on it's position and take him back to the Landing Platform in order to get him safe to home. Proceed Newbie!
